column2: I'm not going to Sunday School or church at all.
column3: I'm not going to Sunday School or church at all.

column2: I couldn't help it.	I couldn't help it.
The very idea of your being scared of those cows, scoffed Davy.
column3: The very idea of your being scared of those cows, scoffed Davy.

column2: We've come to go fishing, announced Davy.
column3: We've come to go fishing, announced Davy.

column2: And they have far better times than we have.	And they have far better times than we have.
Were all your class in Sunday School today?
column3: Were all your class in Sunday School today?

column2: Did you put your collection in?
column3: Did you put your collection in?

column2: Was the Ladies' Aid announced for next week?
column3: Was the Ladies' Aid announced for next week?

column2: You look pale.	You look pale.
You just shut up, Dora Keith.
column3: You just shut up, Dora Keith.
